item.title: Taron Egerton - I'm Still Standing
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Cm and C. Raised a whole step from the original (Bbm and Bb). This is an updated video, just for the intro slide and the description. Sadly, you cannot update a video with a new version on YouTube. I left a link to this video on the original video.
As performed by Taron Egerton in “Sing.” I had originally had Taron Egerton's name wrong, and a number of people wrote comments to complain about it.
My boys enjoyed Sing and frequently sing this song. I had started working on but moved on to other videos. Katie Denure (One Music School) posted a tutorial today (https://youtu.be/m_Xoe9g00oc), which inspired me to wrap up this video. I took away some of the fast Ab Bb C changes that occur at the end of some phrases...feel free to add them back in your own practice. This video offers some good Barre chord practice (partial and full) with Cm, Ab, and Bb.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Visit the sister ukulele channel to this channel, YouTube.com/ukestuff

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Guava Jam Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Gsus4, G7, F, D7, Ab, C7
As performed by The Ka'au Crater Boys.
This song has become a part of the traditional ukulele repertoire as a solo (you can find versions on the web if you would like to learn it), but in this case, you will be acting as the "rhythm section" underneath the solo.
I did not create a tutorial for this video, and you can play any strumming pattern that goes along with the rhythm section.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Mr Blue Sky (Zoë Bestel Cover - Original Key of B-flat) Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. In the original key of B-flat. Want to play along in an easier key? https://youtu.be/-YYdFWKENVo
As performed by Zoë Bestel. Please visit her original recording: https://youtu.be/031v-77x3gU
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Game of Thrones Theme Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Keys of Cm and C.
Published a couple of days before the beginning of Season 7 of Game of Thrones. This show is not for kids, but the theme song is fantastic and they have probably heard it. Follow the chords (the Ab is tricky as a barre chord, but it comes pretty naturally after a Cm), and there is an optional picking part for the last 4 measure.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Mad World - Mad World
item.description: Performed by Gary Jules Written by Roland Orzabal

item.title: Gael García Bernal - Remember Me
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Not easy! Short version of the song in C.
As performed by Gael García Bernal and Gabriella Flores and Libertad García Fonzi.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.
This version matches the educational Color Chord approach and uses four chords: C (red sticker), G (green stickers), F (yellow stickers) and Am (blue sticker).
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: The Stills-Young Band - Long May You Run
item.description: Chords: C, EM7, F, C, Am, G, A-flat
